Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.31163671] 10% hemolysis at >100  μg/mL against human blood cells.
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.31163671] The cell viability of Hepa 1-6 induced by SP2 is 108.8%, 110.1%, 116.9%, 104.7%, 108.8% and 83.1% at peptide concentrations of 3.125, 6.25, 12.5, 25, 50 and 100 μg/mL.

Literature.Title: De Novo Design and In Vitro Testing of Antimicrobial Peptides against Gram-Negative Bacteria.
